name: Study completion
definition: The case where a subject ceases active participation in a trial because the subject has, or is presumed to have followed all appropriate conditions of a protocol.

name: Lost to follow-up
definition: The loss or lack of continuation of subject participation after a study has officially closed.

name: Withdrawal of participant consent
definition: A status indicating that a clinical trial subject is currently off the trial because they have not granted or received consent.

name: Death
definition: A status indicating that a clinical trial subject is currently off the trial because they are deceased.

name: Sponsor decision
definition: An indication that the study subject was removed from the study at the sponsor's request.

name: Other
definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
